title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 1, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of “Madame Tussaud,” who sculpted her first wax statue, of the poet Voltaire, in 1777.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of “Madame Tussaud,” who sculpted her first wax statue, of the poet Voltaire, in 1777.
